post.body: good morning, happy channukah, christmas, kwanza et al!
That alone mkes me not regret moving out of Detroit lol
I am in Muncie Indiana today. single digits. no snow. Flying back to Tampa this evening. Was 80 when I left
is ConRail still around btw?
I don't watch the printed media (and it is a 100 year old auto company) I watch wht they do live @scottmonty does good :)
i think Ford is doing more than a decent job in its social media efforts. They are some of the most genuine out there
thanks for adding me to your follows
can we meet at the airport around 3 pm?
people don't have enough shit to worry about already
good call on the DMB
that was a good one and i dunno!
thanks for adding me

out of here, going to see kids and fly back to Flroida!
